module.name: pre_defined_product_data_management_specializations
module.name.french: Spécialisations prédéfinies de gestion de données de produit
module.keywords: module, PDM, pre defined, activity relationship, security classification, certification, address assignment, person and organization assignment, approval, work request, status

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of specialised assignment and relation objects in the area of basic product data management.
purpose.note: This module adds additional definitions to basic PDM objects as given in the Usage Guide for the STEP PDM Schema V1.2, Release 4.3, January 2002 and ISO 10303-214.

inscope.li: specialized assignments and relations for product data management;
items within the scope of application module Activity, ISO/TS 10303-1047;
items within the scope of application module Approval, ISO/TS 10303-1012;
items within the scope of application module External item identification assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1128;
items within the scope of application module Person organization assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1013;
items within the scope of application module Security classification, ISO/TS 10303-1015;
items within the scope of application module Work request, ISO/TS 10303-1042.

ae.refpath: (applied_organization_assignment <= organization_assignment {organization_assignment.role -> organization_role organization_role organization_role.name !{(organization_role.name = 'author') (organization_role.name = 'classification officer') (organization_role.name = 'creator') (organization_role.name = 'editor') (organization_role.name = 'custodian') (organization_role.name = 'customer') (organization_role.name = 'design supplier') (organization_role.name = 'id owner') (organization_role.name = 'location') (organization_role.name = 'manufacturer') (organization_role.name = 'owner') (organization_role.name = 'read access') (organization_role.name = 'supplier') (organization_role.name = 'wholesaler') (organization_role.name = 'organization in contract') (organization_role.name = 'write access')}}) (applied_person_and_organization_assignment <= person_and_organization_assignment {person_and_organization_assignment.role -> person_and_organization_role person_and_organization_role person_and_organization_role.name !{(person_and_organization_role.name = 'author') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'classification officer') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'creator') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'editor') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'custodian') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'customer') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'design supplier') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'id owner') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'location') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'manufacturer') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'owner') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'read access') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'supplier') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'wholesaler') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'organization in contract') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'write access')}})

(date_assignment date_assignment.role -> date_role date_role.name !{(date_role.name = 'creation') (date_role.name = 'installation') (date_role.name = 'production') (date_role.name = 'registration') (date_role.name = 'update') (date_role.name = 'planned') (date_role.name = 'actual') (date_role.name = 'start date') (date_role.name = 'end date') (date_role.name = 'release date') (date_role.name = 'request date')}) (date_and_time_assignment date_and_time_assignment.role -> date_time_role date_time_role.name !{(date_time_role.name = 'creation') (date_time_role.name = 'installation') (date_time_role.name = 'production') (date_time_role.name = 'registration') (date_time_role.name = 'update') (date_time_role.name = 'planned') (date_time_role.name = 'actual') (date_time_role.name = 'start date') (date_time_role.name = 'end date') (date_time_role.name = 'release date') (date_time_role.name = 'request date')})

versioned_action_request !{(versioned_action_request.purpose = 'change of standard') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'cost reduction') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'customer rejection') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'customer request') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'durability improvement') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'government regulation') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'production alignment') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'procurement alignment') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'production relief') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'production requirement') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'quality improvement') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'security reason') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'standardization') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'supplier request') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'technical improvement') (versioned_action_request.purpose = 'tool improvement')}

(date_assignment date_assignment.role -> date_role date_role.name {(date_role.name = 'creation') (date_role.name = 'installation') (date_role.name = 'production') (date_role.name = 'registration') (date_role.name = 'update') (date_role.name = 'planned') (date_role.name = 'actual') (date_role.name = 'start date') (date_role.name = 'end date') (date_role.name = 'release date') (date_role.name = 'request date')}) (date_and_time_assignment date_and_time_assignment.role -> date_time_role date_time_role.name {(date_time_role.name = 'creation') (date_time_role.name = 'installation') (date_time_role.name = 'production') (date_time_role.name = 'registration') (date_time_role.name = 'update') (date_time_role.name = 'planned') (date_time_role.name = 'actual') (date_time_role.name = 'start date') (date_time_role.name = 'end date') (date_time_role.name = 'release date') (date_time_role.name = 'request date')})

(applied_organization_assignment <= organization_assignment {organization_assignment.role -> organization_role organization_role organization_role.name (organization_role.name = 'author') (organization_role.name = 'classification officer') (organization_role.name = 'creator') (organization_role.name = 'editor') (organization_role.name = 'custodian') (organization_role.name = 'customer') (organization_role.name = 'design supplier') (organization_role.name = 'id owner') (organization_role.name = 'location') (organization_role.name = 'manufacturer') (organization_role.name = 'owner') (organization_role.name = 'read access') (organization_role.name = 'supplier') (organization_role.name = 'wholesaler') (organization_role.name = 'organization in contract') (organization_role.name = 'write access')}) (applied_person_and_organization_assignment <= person_and_organization_assignment {person_and_organization_assignment.role -> person_and_organization_role person_and_organization_role person_and_organization_role.name (person_and_organization_role.name = 'author') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'classification officer') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'creator') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'editor') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'custodian') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'customer') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'design supplier') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'id owner') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'location') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'manufacturer') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'owner') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'read access') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'supplier') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'wholesaler') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'organization in contract') (person_and_organization_role.name = 'write access')})
